verbose_text: MTT assay showed that exposure of human lung epithelial cells (L-132) to 50 nm ZnO-NPs at concentrations of 25, 50, and 100 mug/mL for 24 h significantly reduced the cell viability in a concentration dependent manner.
evidence: MTT assay showed that exposure of human lung epithelial cells (L-132) to 50 nm ZnO-NPs at concentrations of 25, 50, and 100 mug/mL for 24 h significantly reduced the cell viability
